content: get ready to make your saint patrick s day all the more enjoyable with this adorable crochet saint patrick s day leprechaun gnome he d love to hang out with your saint patrick s day decor sitting on a shelf keeping you company at your desk or spreading cheer amongst friends an intermediate level of crochet experience is recommended for some of the techniques used in the design but ambitious beginners are always encouraged to try because this is how advanced skills are developed from the top of his hat to the tip of his shoe he measures approximately 10 inches 25 cm tall just for fun the pattern also includes two different-sized clovers one clover is specific to the design as seen stitched on the leprechaun s hat in the pictures the other clover pattern just a bit smaller can also be used in the design if desired clover patterns for saint patrick s day are just so fun that offering both seemed like a great idea as they can be used separately or in coordination with the leprechaun gnome the crochet saint patrick s day leprechaun gnome is great for gifts imaginative play holiday decoration spreading cheer and more pattern information + your pdf purchase includes written instructions and helpful photographs to aid in construction + the pattern is written in english using us crochet terminology + the pattern is formatted to have one featured image at the beginning of the pattern for reference with all other full-sized images at the end for easy optional printing skills needed + the skill level needed is intermediate but ambitious beginners are always encouraged to try + the techniques you will need to know include chain single_crochet slip_stitch increase invisible decrease working in the back bar of the chain half_double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet working in the front and back loop only bobble stitch invisible finish and the adjustable magic ring materials needed + yarn in your choice of colors about 243-263 yds/222-240 m of worsted/aran + a size e/4 3 5 mm crochet hook + stitch markers + tapestry needle + poly-fil stuffing + pins + scissors + chopstick to help stuff + pet slicker brush optional if brushing the beard finished measurements + using hook size e/4 3 5 mm the crochet saint patrick s day leprechaun gnome measures approximately 10 inches 25 cm from the tip of the toe to the top of the hat thank you thank you for supporting my small business it means the world wishing you a blessed day as you spread kindness and creativity happy crocheting find more this pattern along with many other designs can be
